original_title: La tradition de la bûche de Noël
overview: It's Christmas Eve. Antoine brings his sister Émilie to the Frontenac castle where he is working in the kitchen. Their mother, who is a midwife needs to help with a delivery. Unfortunately, Lotor, the raccoon and Tamia the chipmunk decided to steal food from the castle kitchen and angered the chef. To save the situation, Antoine invents a new type of cake in the shape of a log...
title: La tradition de la bûche de Noël
